column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////every time I've gone here it has smelled like a blend of old fish and cappuccinos. The food usually leaves more to be desired.. the only thing I've ever really enjoyed was the yogurt parfait
column2: but how could you mess that up? their Arnold palmers are good too
column3: that's about it. every time I have walked out the door I have found myself confused as to how this place is so popular.
